name: B0X: The existentialist box mover robot
name_original: B0X: The existentialist box mover robot
description:
B0X: The existentialist box mover robot is a puzzle game developed by Hector Gonzalez. It came out on 08-04-2023.
You can play B0X: The existentialist box mover robot on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
